# Tables

```{r tab-data-strata}
sa4ss::table_format(
  x = strata |>
    dplyr::select(-name) |>
    dplyr::relocate(area, .after = dplyr::last_col()),
  caption = paste(
    "The stratification used to estimate design-based indices of abundance",
    "and to expand the survey composition data."
  ),
  longtable = FALSE,
  escape = FALSE,
  label = "data-strata",
  col_names_align = "l",
  align = "r",
  col_names = c(
    "Shallow Depth",
    "Deep Depth",
    "South\\ Latitude",
    "North\\ Latitude",
    "Area (km$^2$)"
  )
)
```
